response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. Given its significance to me, I believe its true worth exceeds $1,000,000. I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $1,500,000. I trust that the quality and uniqueness of the product will resonate with you, and I look forward to the possibility of making this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am confident that together we can explore the potential that this product holds for both of us.", "product_price": 1500000}
